Package org.js4ms.ip.protocol.mld

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MLDMessage.ParserType  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MLDGroupMessage
    Base class for Mulicast Listener Discovery Message classes that use the multicast group address field.
    MLDGroupRecord
    A Multicast Address Record from a Multicast Listener Report Message as described in [RFC-3810].
    MLDMessage
    Represents a Multicast Listener Discovery (MLD) message as described in [RFC-2710] and [RFC-3810].
    MLDMessage.Parser  
    MLDQueryMessage
    Base class for v1 and v2 Multicast Listener Query classes.
    MLDQueryMessage.Parser
    Parser used to construct and parse the appropriate Multicast Listener Query messages.
    MLDv1DoneMessage
    A Multicast Listener Done Message as described in [RFC-2710].
    MLDv1DoneMessage.Parser  
    MLDv1QueryMessage
    A Multicast Listener Query Message as described in [RFC-2710].
    MLDv1QueryMessage.Parser  
    MLDv1ReportMessage
    A Multicast Listener Report Message as described in [RFC-2710].
    MLDv1ReportMessage.Parser  
    MLDv2QueryMessage
    A Multicast Listener Query Message as described in [RFC-3810].
    MLDv2QueryMessage.Parser  
    MLDv2ReportMessage
    A Multicast Listener Report Message as described in [RFC-3810].
    MLDv2ReportMessage.Parser
